name: MBlue Simple-Gray Popup
description:
Description:
 Rounded gray popups to integrate with Simple-Gray Styles.
--------------------------------------------------------------------
What it does:
 - makes the popups light-gray and rounded
 - makes the Personal-Bookmarks popups BLACK and rounded
 - makes all popups a little transparent
 - makes the popups font small & bold
 - makes the separator dotted
 - gives a blue highlight effect to all popups
 - integrates with the other Simple-Gray styles
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Supported Extensions:
 None.
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Notes:
 It's recommended to restart Firefox after enabling this style.
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Integrates with:
 MBlue Simple-Gray Theme
 MBlue Simple-Gray Theme Ext-Support
 MBlue Simple-Gray Sidebar
 MBlue Simple-Gray Sidebar Ext-Support
 MBlue Simple-Gray Slim-Download
 MBlue Simple-Gray Slim-Extension
 MBlue Simple-Gray Top-Toolbar
 MBlue Combine Nav-Buttons Vista
